tldr: This article discusses various receptions held during the Tercentenary Celebrations of the Royal Society. It mentions a tea party with Queen Elizabeth The Queen Mother, a reception by Her Majesty's Government at Lancaster House, a reception by the University of London, and two receptions by the Lord Mayor and Corporation of the City of London, and the Twelve Great City Companies.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science and Technology
